sentences.en: ‘A sort of bodyguard?’ ‘That's the idea.’.
sentences.cn: “是保镖什么的吗？”“对了。”。

sentences.en: "I told you Preskel had no idea," remarked Kemp with some asperity.
sentences.cn: “我告诉过你普雷斯克毫不知情的，”肯普颇为不耐烦地说道。

sentences.en: Ford had the bright idea of paying workers enough to buy cars.
sentences.cn: 福特公司想出了一绝妙的主意：付给工人足够的薪水去购买汽车。

sentences.en: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.cn: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

sentences.en: He toyed with the idea of going to China.
sentences.cn: 他动过去中国的念头，但并没当真。

sentences.en: I did not have the foggiest idea what he meant.
sentences.cn: 我根本不知道他是什么意思。

sentences.en: I don't have the least idea of what you're talking about.
sentences.cn: 我一点儿都不知道你在说什么。

sentences.en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentences.cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentences.en: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.cn: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.en: It sounds like a wonderful idea to me, does it really work?
sentences.cn: 听起来这个主意很不错，真的能行吗？

sentences.en: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.cn: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.en: it's not my idea of a happy ending.
sentences.cn: 这并非我以为的大团圆结局。

sentences.en: MacDougall began to get ideas above his station.
sentences.cn: 麦克杜格尔开始有了超出自己地位的野心。

sentences.en: She had a confused idea of life in general.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，她对生活非常困惑。

sentences.en: she had no idea where she was going.
sentences.cn: 她完全不知道自己要去哪里。

sentences.en: She persevered in her idea despite obvious objections raised by friends.
sentences.cn: 虽然朋友们明确反对，她还是坚持己见。

sentences.en: The idea for this book grew out of conversations with Philippa Brewster.
sentences.cn: 创作这本书的想法来源于跟菲莉帕·布鲁斯特的谈话。

sentences.en: The idea is to encourage people to get to know their neighbours.
sentences.cn: 其目的是促使人们结识邻居。

sentences.en: The idea is to get the jump on him.
sentences.cn: 想法是要胜过他。

sentences.en: The police told me. It was a bombshell. I had no idea.
sentences.cn: 是警察告诉我的。我很震惊，完全没想到。

sentences.en: The whole idea was to give history a happy gloss.
sentences.cn: 整个想法就是要粉饰历史。

sentences.en: They have only a vague idea of the amount of water available.
sentences.cn: 他们只是大概知道可用水的总量。

sentences.en: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.cn: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。
